Singer, songwriter, actress and writer Lucy Walsh talks about her new book "Remember Me as Human." Walsh, daughter of Eagles guitarist Joe Walsh, wrote her book after a three-day interview with her grandmother. "Remember Me as Human" is a tribute to family and her grandparents' love story.
